context: Hi, what movies do you like?
I like mind benders and documentaries.
My favorite little known thriller is Identity (2003)
Oh, I haven't heard of that.
The new RBG (2018) documentary is good. Ken burns' documentaries are great. There's a pbs channel with great documentaries.
I watch a lot of Netflix documentaries. I haven't seen RBG but I'll check into it.
Split (2017) is like Identity (2003) . Have you seen that?
I believe I saw a trailer for Split (2017) sounds familiar but I can't be sure if I've seen it
resp: Room (2005) , Buried (2010) , and Exam (2009) are great little thrillers.
